yaml.title: NSC-R Tidy Tuesday
yaml.description: Improve your R skills in entertaining, inspiring and supportive sessions moderated by your own colleagues..
yaml.author: Tim Verlaan

markdown.markdown:
![](Screenshot.PNG)

The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which was aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

Join this workshop meeting on Zoom by clicking [this link](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84460236110?pwd=cUovNFdtbnRheE44ZVV0b2s1bkVnUT09)

In this meeting, Tim will explain what Sankey diagrams are, and how they can be created in R.

> **Tim Verlaan** is a PhD candidate at the Netherlands Institute for the Study of Crime and Law Enforcement (NSCR).


-   The [script (R)](script.R) that Tim worked through.
-   The [presentation](presentation.pptx) that Tim used.

[Tim Verlaan](https://nscr.nl/en/medewerker/tim-verlaan)
